We sale and repair all type of mobile phone, ipads, ipods , laptops and desktop computers. We have highly skilled team with vast experience . We can fix all type of phone and computers problem in very reasonable prices. For Free quote please call us today or send us a Free quote request. We are open 7 days a week 9AM-5:30PM Mon-Sat, 10AM-4PM on Sunday.
For Manchester Call Us on: 0161 864 4787 For Altrincham Call Us on : 0161 929 4913 For Rochdale Call Us on : 0170 675 9268
